function NPC_1000006:Init( NPCID ) --[[ PARTS 1 : 손등 2 : 드러머 왼손 3 : 북
USERDATA 1 : 북 2 : 손등 3 : Pain 4 : 현재 Drum 오오라 인덱스 5 : 분노모드 돌입여부 --]]
NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 5 )
NPC_1000006.LimitForBreakDrum = NPC_1000006.MaxHP / 2 NPC_1000006.LimitForBreakShell = NPC_1000006.MaxHP / 10 NPC_1000006.LimitForPain = NPC_1000006.MaxHP / 10 NPC_1000006.LimitForRage = NPC_1000006.MaxHP / 2
NPC_1000006.TalIdPain1 = 211308308 NPC_1000006.TalIdPain2 = 211308309
NPC_1000006.TalIDChangeMode0 = 211308330 NPC_1000006.TalIdChangeMode1 = 211308310 NPC_1000006.TalIdChangeMode2 = 211308331 NPC_1000006.TalIdChangeMode3 = 211308332
NPC_1000006.TalIdMode1Pain1 = 211308328 NPC_1000006.TalIdMode1Pain2 = 211308329
NPC_1000006.BufIdsDrumSound = { 40152, 40154, 40156, 40158, 40162, 40164, 40166, 40168 } NPC_1000006.DurationsDrumSound = { 20, 20, 20, 20, 10, 10, 10, 10 } NPC_1000006.BufCount = 8
NPC_1000006.TimerIdSetDrum = 1 NPC_1000006.TimerIdBufExpire = 2
NPC_1000006.BufIdZombieSlow = 40161
end
function NPC_1000006:StartCombat( ThisNPC, Enemy ) --GLog( "===== Start Combat =====\n" ) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_1000006.TalIDChangeMode0 ) NPC_1000006:SetDrum( ThisNPC, 1 ) end
function NPC_1000006:SetDrum( ThisNPC, Index ) --GLog( "SetDrum( " .. Index .." )\n" )
local BufIdx = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 4 ) -- Clear current drum aura
if BufIdx > 0 then ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_1000006.BufIdsDrumSound[ BufIdx ] ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4 , 0 ) end
if Index <= 0 then return end
if Index <= NPC_1000006.BufCount/2 then ThisNPC:NarrationNow( "$$COLT_1000006_218" ) else ThisNPC:NarrationNow( "$$COLT_1000006_220" ) end
ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_1000006.BufIdsDrumSound[ Index ] ) --GLog ( "SetBuf (" .. NPC_1000006.BufIdsDrumSound[ Index ] .. ") \n" )
ThisNPC:SetTimer( NPC_1000006.TimerIdBufExpire, NPC_1000006.DurationsDrumSound[ Index ] , false ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, Index ) end
function NPC_1000006:OnTimer( Index ) if this:GetMode() == 0 and ( this:GetHP() < NPC_1000006.LimitForRage ) then this:UseTalentSelf( NPC_1000006.TalIdChangeMode2 ) return end
--GLog( "-----[ OnTimer( " .. Index .. " ) ]-----\n" )
if Index == NPC_1000006.TimerIdBufExpire then if this:CheckBPart(3) then return end
if this:IsNowCombat() then NPC_1000006:NextDrum(this) else this:UseTalentSelf( NPC_1000006.TalIdChangeMode3 ) end end end
function NPC_1000006:OnFinishModeChange1( ThisNPC, Enemy ) end
function NPC_1000006:OnFinishModeChange2( ThisNPC, Enemy ) NPC_1000006:NextDrum( AsNPC(ThisNPC) ) end
function NPC_1000006:OnFinishModeChange3( ThisNPC, Enemy ) NPC_1000006:SetDrum( AsNPC(ThisNPC), 0 ) end
function NPC_1000006:NextDrum( ThisNPC ) local NumberOfBufs = NPC_1000006.BufCount/2 local BufIdx = ThisNPC:GetUserData(4)
--GLog( "BufIdx" .. BufIdx .."\n" )
if BufIdx == 0 then return end
if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 0 then NPC_1000006:SetDrum( ThisNPC, ( BufIdx + math.random( 0,NumberOfBufs-2) ) % NumberOfBufs +1 ) elseif ThisNPC:GetMode() == 2 then local NextBufIdx if BufIdx > NumberOfBufs then NextBufIdx = ( BufIdx%NumberOfBufs + math.random( 0,NumberOfBufs-2) ) % NumberOfBufs +1 else NextBufIdx = ( BufIdx + math.random( 0,NumberOfBufs-2) ) % NumberOfBufs +5 end
NPC_1000006:SetDrum( ThisNPC, NextBufIdx )
if NextBufIdx > NumberOfBufs then ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_1000006.BufIdZombieSlow ) else ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_1000006.BufIdZombieSlow ) end end end
function NPC_1000006:AccDamage( ThisNPC, DataIdx, HitInfo ) if ( DataIdx == 1 and not ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 3 ) ) or ( DataIdx == 2 and not ThisNPC:CheckBPart( 1 ) ) then ThisNPC:SetUserData( DataIdx, ThisNPC:GetUserData( DataIdx ) + HitInfo.Damage ) end
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) + HitInfo.Damage )
--[[ --GLog( "-- Process Acc Damage ( P:" .. DataIdx .. ", D:" .. HitInfo.Damage .. ", 1:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) .. ", 2:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) .. ", 3:" .. ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) .. " )--\n" ) --]]
-- reaction if not ChkMFForHitReaction( HitInfo ) then return end
-- 북 파괴 if DataIdx == 1 and ThisNPC:GetUserData(DataIdx) > NPC_1000006.LimitForBreakDrum then if not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_1000006.TalIdChangeMode1 ) then --GLog( "To Mode1\n" ) ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_1000006.TalIdChangeMode1 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( 3, HitInfo.Attacker )
ThisNPC:SetUserData( DataIdx , 0 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3 , 0 ) NPC_1000006:SetDrum( ThisNPC, 0 ) end
return end
-- 손등 파괴 if DataIdx == 2 and ThisNPC:GetUserData(DataIdx) > NPC_1000006.LimitForBreakShell then if not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_1000006.TalIdPain1 ) then --GLog( "Pain1" ) ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_1000006.TalIdPain1 ) ThisNPC:BreakPart( 1, HitInfo.Attacker )
ThisNPC:SetUserData( DataIdx , 0 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3 , 0 ) end
return end
-- pain if ThisNPC:GetUserData(3) > NPC_1000006.LimitForPain then if not ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_1000006.TalIdPain2 ) then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_1000006.TalIdPain2 )
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3 , 0 ) end return end end
--[[ HitCapsule Callback functions. --]] function NPC_1000006:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) NPC_1000006:AccDamage( this, 1, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_1000006:OnHitCapsule_1_1(HitInfo) NPC_1000006:AccDamage( this, 2, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_1000006:OnHitCapsule_1_2(HitInfo) NPC_1000006:AccDamage( this, 3, HitInfo ) end
